title: Swiss ski symphony = Schweizer ski-symphonie
brief_description: Scenes of skiing of all kinds are carefully edited to synchronise with a symphonic piece played by a full orchestra. Photography by Josef Dahinden and music by Jean Daetwyler. No commentary.
